title: Infinite 8-bit Platformer
summary:
Infinite 8-bit Platformer is a Free Software multiplayer
user-created-content platform video game written in Pygame. It's a bit
like a cross between a wiki and a game, because the players can also
create and edit the levels. In this talk we will look at the development
of the game over the last three years, including what has changed since
PyCon 2010. We'll examine the sound, graphics, and networking
architecture which is built upon pygame and asyncore (PodSixNet).
